alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Collier and southeastern Hendry Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, or 30 miles south of Montura, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Collier and southeastern Hendry Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County
